articles.description:
RT Scalara
One main advantage of indices is the diversification they provide -- not putting all eggs in one basket.
How can we quantify this for the Scalara NFT Index?
Comparing volatility of the constituents and the index shows that $NFTI is fluctuating less than the constituents. #NFT
